data.text: @enews @MiamiPD Why wouldn't the police officer help him....Anddd stalked him..Maybe someone in the clud could have Helped him....I Don't get this...Was he Dangerous?  Arrest Smellssss

@enews So he approached a civil servant and asked for help getting an Uber. Pretty responsible thing to do being he’s uber drunk...and civil servant refuses to help, opting to later arrest a man and do paperwork; rather than using an app to help get him a ride. #wtf
@enews @hannibalburess because I want to hear it straight from you lol
